PERSONA:
meet john, a 68-year-old retired white man living in a metropolitan area in the northeast region, specifically the middle atlantic division. john is a high school graduate with no further formal education. he was born and raised in the united states and is a citizen.

john is in a committed relationship, living with his partner. he identifies as a protestant christian and attends religious services once a week. politically, john aligns with the republican party and holds conservative views.

despite being retired, john is financially secure, with a family income of $100,000 or more, placing him in the upper-income tier. he is a registered voter and is certain about his registration status at his current address.

in his free time, john frequently volunteers and is an avid internet user, spending almost constant time online. he leads an active lifestyle in his metropolitan community, surrounded by diverse cultures and opportunities.

overall, john is a well-established individual with strong ties to his faith, political beliefs, and community involvement. his financial stability and conservative values shape his worldview and lifestyle choices.
